name: Make Them Naked
description:
Welcome to Make Them Naked!
It's a cute and relaxing game that offers you four different characters to undress. Make a cup of tea and dive into the world of love! The game allows you to play with one hand thanks to an easy control.



Each girl has a different personality and preferences:

  • Wendy - a shy girl who doesn't like rude people.
  • Yuka - a life of the party who loves joking.
  • Natsumi - a mystery of this world. It'll be a challenge to undress her.
  • Aurora - a dominant one. Aren't you scared?

Choose correct dialogue options to seduce your companion.



Click the circles to the beat!



We wish you to have a good time. We'd be delighted if you leave a review about this game.
